title: Rump of lamb served with a ragoût of peas, carrot and lettuce
description: A surprisingly quick recipe for delicious lamb browned on the hob and finished in the oven. Using the same pan to cook the simple vegetable ragoût captures all of the meaty flavours.
ingredients: 4 x 175g/6oz rumps of lamb, bone removed, trimmed
salt and freshly ground black pepper
100g/3½oz bacon lardons or pancetta, cut into batons
2 carrots, cut into a small dice
